channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 欧盟寻找关键矿物
item.description: The European Union's law to guarantee a supply of minerals crucial for its green and digital transitions and to end its dependence on Chinese supply will enter force early next year after securing final approval this month.翻译:欧盟旨在保障对其绿色和数字化转型至关重要的矿产供应并结束对中国供应依赖的法律将于本月获得最终批准后于明年初生效。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 欧盟设定了关键的矿产目标，但实现这些目标面临困难
item.description: The European Union has set targets to dig up, recycle and refine lithium, cobalt and other metals it needs for its green transition, but a shortage of new money, crippling energy costs and local opposition could put them beyond reach.翻译:欧盟设定了开采、回收和精炼绿色转型所需的锂、钴和其他金属的目标，但新资金短缺、能源成本大幅下降以及当地反对可能使这些目标遥不可及。
item.author: Philip Blenkinsop

item.title: 美国认为河内与北京的防务承诺不会对越南关系产生影响
item.description: The United States will continue to closely cooperate with Vietnam, a U.S. official said after Hanoi announced last week strengthened ties with China, including on defence and security, as the two great powers compete for influence.翻译:在河内上周宣布加强与中国的关系（包括国防和安全领域）后，一名美国官员表示，在两个大国争夺影响力之际，美国将继续与越南密切合作。
item.author: Francesco Guarascio

item.title: 随着消费者违约率上升，中国银行加大不良贷款销售力度
item.description: Chinese banks are putting bad loans up for sale at a record pace, as regulators push for faster disposal of sour debts amid rising consumer defaults during an ailing post-COVID economic recovery.翻译:在疫情后经济复苏不佳期间，消费者违约率不断上升，监管机构推动加快处置不良债务，中国的银行正以创纪录的速度出售不良贷款。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 北方深冻，南方罕见降雪
item.description: The cold weather sweeping China brought rare snowfall on Monday as far south as the province of Guangdong, while temperatures in the chilly north plunged to near historic lows for the month.翻译:周一，席卷中国的寒冷天气给南部广东省带来了罕见的降雪，而寒冷的北方气温则跌至接近本月历史最低水平。
item.author: Liz Lee, Ryan Woo

item.title: 腾讯在与网易的游戏对决中转向字节跳动
item.description: Tencent Holdings is relying on one-time bitter rival ByteDance to promote its most important video game release in years, in a sign of warming relations as well as intensifying competition as China's gaming industry returns to growth.翻译:腾讯控股依靠曾经的死对头字节跳动来推广其多年来最重要的视频游戏发行，这是关系升温的迹象，也是随着中国游戏行业恢复增长而加剧的竞争。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 2024年民主将走向何方？特朗普可能拥有最终决定权
item.description: Russia's Vladimir Putin looks set to remain in power until at least 2030; India's Narendra Modi seems certain to extend his rule to 2029; and Donald Trump could return to the White House despite charges of subverting U.S. democracy.翻译:俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京 (Vladimir Putin) 看来将继续掌权至少到 2030 年；印度的纳伦德拉·莫迪 (Narendra Modi) 似乎肯定会将其统治延长至 2029 年；尽管被指控颠覆美国民主，唐纳德·特朗普仍可能重返白宫。
item.author: Mark Bendeich

item.title: 中国与朝鲜在导弹发射期间举行高层会晤
item.description: China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi held high-level talks with a senior North Korean official in Beijing on Monday, coinciding with Pyongyang's launch of a missile capable of reaching anywhere in the United States.翻译:中国外交部长王毅周一在北京与朝鲜高级官员举行了高层会谈，恰逢平壤发射了一枚能够到达美国任何地方的导弹。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：市场在日本央行“会或不会”上发挥作用
item.description: A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.翻译:韦恩·科尔 (Wayne Cole) 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国首艘超深水钻井船将进行海试
item.description: China will on Friday conduct sea trials for its first ocean research drilling vessel, capable of drilling at depths of more than 10,000 metres (32,800 feet), a key step towards beefing up the country's deep-sea oil and gas exploration capabilities.翻译:中国将于周五对其第一艘海洋研究钻探船进行海上试验，该船能够在超过10,000米（32,800英尺）的深度进行钻探，这是增强中国深海石油和天然气勘探能力的关键一步。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 由于限制措施不断加强，亚洲化肥买家不再关注主要出口国中国
item.description: Asian fertiliser buyers are seeking alternatives to Chinese supplies on concerns the world's top exporter has become an increasingly unreliable supplier after curbs on shipments to protect its domestic market, buyers and analysts said.翻译:买家和分析师表示，亚洲化肥买家正在寻找中国供应的替代品，因为他们担心，在为保护国内市场而限制发货后，中国这个世界最大的出口国已成为一个越来越不可靠的供应商。
item.author: Mei Mei Chu, Rajendra Jadhav

item.title: 官员称2024年中国经济状况将改善
item.description: China's economy is expected to see more favourable conditions and more opportunities than challenges in 2024, state media said citing officials of the Chinese Communist Party's finance and economy office.翻译:官方媒体援引中共中央财经办公室官员的话称，预计2024年中国经济将面临更多有利条件、机遇多于挑战。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 花旗集团中国投资银行计划因数据法而推迟 - 彭博新闻
item.description: Citigroup Inc's plan to set up a wholly-owned securities business in China is taking longer than expected because the bank needs more time to comply with the country's data laws, Bloomberg News reported on Monday.翻译:据彭博社周一报道，花旗集团在中国设立全资证券业务的计划比预期要长，因为该银行需要更多时间来遵守中国的数据法。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾报告更多疑似中国气象气球穿越台湾海峡
item.description: Two suspected Chinese weather balloons flew across the sensitive Taiwan Strait on Sunday but stayed well to the north of Taiwan, the island's defence ministry said on Monday, the second time this month Taipei has reported them nearby.翻译:台湾国防部周一表示，两个疑似中国气象气球周日飞越敏感的台湾海峡，但仍停留在台湾北部，这是台北本月第二次报告它们在附近。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 香港具有里程碑意义的黎智英安全审判开庭，安保严密
item.description: A landmark national security trial for leading China critic Jimmy Lai opened in Hong Kong on Monday amid tight security, with the pro-democracy activist battling charges that he colluded with foreign forces, including the United States.翻译:对中国主要批评者黎智英的一次具有里程碑意义的国家安全审判周一在戒备森严的情况下在香港开庭，这位亲民主活动人士对他与包括美国在内的外国势力勾结的指控进行了斗争。
item.author: Jessie Pang, James Pomfret

item.title: 香港奢侈品零售商调整以应对高消费中国游客的下降
item.description: Hong Kong's luxury retailers are adapting to fewer wealthy Chinese shoppers visiting the city and a shift towards tourists flocking to Instagram-coveted spots in trendy districts rather than splashing out on pricey branded gear.翻译:香港的奢侈品零售商正在适应来香港旅游的中国富裕购物者的减少，以及游客涌向时尚地区那些在 Instagram 上令人垂涎的景点的趋势，而不是花钱购买昂贵的品牌装备。
item.author: Farah Master

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，中国公司希望在马来西亚组装高端芯片
item.description: A growing number of Chinese semiconductor design companies are tapping Malaysian firms to assemble a portion of their high-end chips, keen to hedge risks in case the U.S. expands sanctions on China's chip industry, sources said.翻译:消息人士称，越来越多的中国半导体设计公司正在利用马来西亚公司来组装部分高端芯片，热衷于对冲美国扩大对中国芯片行业制裁的风险。
item.author: Fanny Potkin, Yantoultra Ngui

item.title: 香港审判开始之际，英国呼吁释放黎智英
item.description: Britain called for Hong Kong to release Jimmy Lai ahead of the trial of the leading China critic and media tycoon on charges he colluded with foreign forces, including the United States.翻译:英国呼吁香港在对这位主要中国批评者和媒体大亨进行审判之前释放黎智英，罪名是他与包括美国在内的外国势力勾结。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 洞察：叛乱分子的火力和中国的愤怒：缅甸反军政府攻势的内部
item.description: Generals from Myanmar's junta held peace talks in June near the border with China with representatives of three powerful ethnic armies. They sat across a wide table covered with blue cloth and decorated with elaborate bouquets.翻译:六月，缅甸军政府将军在与中国接壤的边境附近与三个强大民族军队的代表举行了和谈。他们坐在一张铺着蓝色桌布、装饰着精致花束的宽桌子旁。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国疲软的房地产业和零售销售让刺激呼吁继续存在
item.description: China's property sector worsened in November as negative home buyer sentiment and indebted developers drove down sales and investment, while broader retail sector activity missed forecasts, suggesting more support is needed to shore up demand.翻译:由于购房者情绪低迷和负债累累的开发商压低了销售和投资，而更广泛的零售业活动低于预期，中国房地产行业在 11 月份恶化，这表明需要更多支持来提振需求。
item.author: Ellen Zhang, Joe Cash, Liangping Gao
